alert.note: Alert for Parke; Vermillion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 5:52PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Parke and southern Vermillion Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 551 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clinton, or 12 miles north of Terre Haute, moving northeast at 20 mph. Storm are weakly rotating and have the potential to produce a brief tornado. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Clinton around 605 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
